TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable PeerApplication extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.IEquatable`1<class System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication>, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class PeerApplication Implements IDisposable, IEquatable(Of PeerApplication), ISerializable
type PeerApplication = class interface IDisposable interface IEquatable<PeerApplication> interface ISerializable

summary.span: Represents an application that is available for use with the Peer Collaboration infrastructure.

span.span: Represents an application that is available for use with the Peer Collaboration infrastructure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序是一组软件或软件功能可对等方从终结点。An application is a set of software or software features available to a peer from an endpoint. 通常情况下，这是指启用网络的软件程序包，例如，游戏或其他协作应用程序。Commonly, this refers to network-enabled software packages such as games or other collaborative applications. 一个定义的软件应用程序或组件可用于组网络。A defines the set of software applications or components available for use with the network. 此网络启用基础结构参与者可以启动此应用程序的使用情况。This network enables infrastructure participants to initiate usage of this application. 它们可能会启动协作会话使用此类标识的应用程序。They may initiate a collaboration session using the application identified by this class. 构建此类的实例并设置适当的属性之后, 此对象可能会使用在协作会话。After constructing an instance of this class and setting the appropriate properties, this object may be used in collaboration sessions. 其用途通过将其传递到对等方协作来实现和方法，这将启用或禁用它。Its use is accomplished by passing it to the peer collaboration and methods, which will enable or disable it. 全局唯一和可以成功注册应用程序之前，必须设置此实例的属性。The globally unique and properties of this instance must be set before the application can successfully be registered. 向对等方协作基础结构中注册应用程序之后, 仍然在注册表中存在的注册信息。After registering an application with the Peer Collaboration infrastructure, the registration information persists in the registry. 这使得应用程序可用于协作应用程序，即使程序注册应用程序已退出。This makes the application available to collaboration applications even after the program which registered the application has exited. 已注册后更改应用程序实例上的属性不起此注册。Changing the properties on an application instance after it has been registered has no effect on the registration. 若要更新的注册，必须注销应用程序并将其再次使用新的信息注册。To update the registration, the application must be unregistered and then registered again with the new information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此数据是自由格式，并提供托管的对等方。This data is free form and is provided by the hosting peer. 可以提供数据的最长为 4,096 个字节。The maximum amount of data that can be provided is 4,096 bytes. 此数据不是属于邀请，但它允许其他数据要与本地对等方上的应用程序相关联。This data is not part of a invitation, but rather allows additional data to be associated with the application on the local peer.

exception.span: The size of this binary data object is either less than 0 or greater than 4,096 bytes.
